attributes.additional_details: These weapons are not required for people living in the UK.  They are only required to create violence and terror for the general public.
attributes.background: Outlaw the possession of these weapons.  Ban the sale of these weapons.  They add no value to our society.

rejection.details: You can read more about the ban on zombie-style knives and machetes here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/zombie-style-knives-banned
